name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 21, a man posted a video saying that he was a fan of Sima Nan when he was in college, and he always talked about the proletariat.
It was not until he began to learn about philosophy, law, and psychology that he realized that his previous view of the problem was too stupid and one-sided. The complexity of human nature and society is far from being summarized by a grand narrative like the proletariat. In particular, academic work must be rigorous and logical, and not make big and broad empty words.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 21, Wenling, Zhejiang. The boss of Jianxuan Shoe Factory fled, and the workers jumped off the building to demand their wages.
